biotools.summary: Gene set analysis method based on GSZ (Gene Set Z-score) statistics and asymptotic p-value. It is different from the standard GSZ method in that it assigns asymptotic p-values to the gene set scores instead of empirical p-values.

bioschemas.name: mGSZ
bioschemas.summary: Gene set analysis method based on GSZ (Gene Set Z-score) statistics and asymptotic p-value. It is different from the standard GSZ method in that it assigns asymptotic p-values to the gene set scores instead of empirical p-values.
